full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA'I RNAL 'BYOR BCU GCIG NYAMS SU LEN PA'I TSUL RJE DKON MCHOG LHUN GRUB KYIS MDZAD PA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B RJE BTZUN RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA'I BCU GCIG NYAMS SU LEN TSUL 'DI YANG DON GNYER MANG POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, NGAG 'DON RNAMS BLA MA RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO KUN DGA' BZANG PO'I GSUNG RAB GZHIR BZHAG ,RNAL 'BYOR LHAG MA RNAMS DPAL SA SKYA CHEN PO'I GSUNG RAB KHA BSKANG STE, ,NYAMS SU BLANG BDE BAR BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG LHUN GRUB KYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
